entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3 except plus 3 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 5 except 11 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 5 except 11 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 4 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 7 April 2023
